page.title: 09ON THE SAME FARM TO-DAY
page.content: The same farm to-day is organised very differently.Livestock to-day consists of 20 beef cattle and 1 cow.The horse and cart have gone completely to be replaced by tractor and trailer. Very few of the old farmhouses are now lived in as they were.Some have now become farm buildings for storage etc,others have been tossed, while others have been renovated to provide modern comfortable housing for the family. Some potatoes are grown each year but the present{Campbell}children depend on a diet very much different to that of their ancestors and from a very different source- the Co-Operative Supermarket in{Omagh.}
